price: 101. Iš tiesų, tie, kuriems Mūsų gėris tapo pirmesnis, jie bus atitolinti toli nuo to (Pragaro) [t. y. Isa (Jėzus, Marjamos (Marijos) sūnus, Uzair (Ezra)].
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ سَبَقَتۡ لَهُم مِّنَّا ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰٓ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ عَنۡهَا مُبۡعَدُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna sabaqat lahum minnā al-ḥus'nā ulāika ʿanhā mub'ʿadūna
